Posts.Title: Indentation on Breast SueI12345 aldumont01

Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2011 03:29PM debbie227 wrote: Four days ago, noticed an indentation on my left breast that is vertical and noticeable all the time. There is also what feels like small hard lumps at the top and bottom of the indentation. There is also what feels like a hardened vein?artery? going from my arm pit all the way down to the bottom of the breast. Breast also looks slightly larger/swollen at the bottom. Saw the gyne on Tues. Mammo and Ultrasound  yesterday showed nothing that they could biopsy and no thrombosis. Radiologist couldn't explain why I had the indentation or hardened vein.  She asked me if I recently lost weight....really? I wish. I'm 42, no family history of BC.   I'm waiting for the gyne to call when he gets results but of course, I am worried and wondering if  anyone has experienced this and what results were. I feel like something is wrong, but after leaving the breast center I just felt stupid and confused. Radiologist just said I should probably see a breast surgeon. Any guidance, experience, would be much appreciated. Thanks for reading this.
Posts.Title: Indentation on Breast SueI12345 aldumont01
